name: BG-Omics
body:
### Welcome to BG-Omics Thermotoga-project repository. This project aims to be able to compare protein sequences of one species from Thermotoga organism to another species in the same genus.The desired result is a data table containing all locus tags of matched protein from the given organisms. ![picture](https://raw.github.com/bgomics/thermotoga/master/resultpage.png) ### Technology We are using different technologies to achieve the goal.Here are the main technologies we are using:
1.Python(BioPython).
2.MySql.
3.PHP.
4.Javascript.
### Authors and Contributors Project is managed by BGOmics group from Bowling Green State University.
Developers Richard Nyonyi @mutatina, Jacob Newmister @newmisterJ ### Support or Contact contact us at bgomics@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
